description: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times weekly. Offered annually in the fall semester. Prerequisite: JAPAN 112 or its equivalent.
name: Intermed Japanese I
notes: Students in Japan 231B must also register for lab Japan 231 AL or BL.
title: Intermediate Japanese I
